w:r.w:t: Qualified, Professional and Institutional Investors only

In order to secure Preferred Shares (“Shares”) of XAI Corp (“Company” or “XAI”), the Issuer has invited its Limited Partners and Institutional Relations to consider the present investment opportunity directly in a first layer with a Fund invested on the Company’s captable. Note this Opportunity is provided by the Issuer as an alternative solution due to the scarcity of XAI shares in both primary and secondary markets. VERSO Management Ltd, a regulated Category 2 and Category 3 license holder, shall act as exclusive Arranger for this transaction.
VERSO Capital 2 SCSP (“Issuer”), United States incl. OTC / ISIN issuances
VERSO Management Limited, regulated by BVI FSC (“Arranger”)
Qualified Limited Partners and Institutional Clients (“Purchaser”)
Fund on Captable, Delaware, United States (“Seller”)
VCL to invest in Captable Fund, multiple tranches for funding approved
(instead of 20.00% no hurdle rate, no applicable cap)
Dupont Partners Law Firm, Luxembourg (“Lead Counsel”)
No later than 3 days prior to confirmed Completion Date by Company with effective funds on Escrow Account (T-3)
The Arranger has obtained approval for the present offering from the Issuer
The Issuer shall issue a Subscription Pack to be executed by the Purchaser
The Issuer shall provide the Purchasers Share Certificates and Statement of Holdings upon Completion
The content of the present term sheet remains indicative, subject to change
This indicative term sheet expires on
